messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for BasisLZ supercompression.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_XYZW but for BasisLZ supercompression it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_ETC1S.

messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #2 channelType in basic DFD block is (0xF) which is not valid for colorModel KHR_DF_MODEL_XYZW.
